UpdateSourceArgs: -c 'cd space-station14/server && download_url=$(curl -s https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/manifest.json | jq -r ".builds | to_entries | last | .value.server.\"linux-x64\".url") && curl -sLOJ "$download_url" && unzip -qo SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip && rm -rf SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip && chmod +x Robust.Server'

-c 'cd space-station14/server && download_url=$(curl -s https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/manifest.json | jq -r ".builds | to_entries | last | .value.server.\"linux-arm64\".url") && curl -sLOJ "$download_url" && unzip -qo SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip && rm -rf SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip && chmod +x Robust.Server'

/C start powershell.exe -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -WindowStyle Hidden -Command "cd space-station14/server ; $Manifest = Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri 'https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/manifest.json' | ConvertFrom-Json ; $LastBuildKey = $Manifest.builds | Select-Object -Last 1 | ForEach-Object { $_.PSObject.Properties.Name } ; $DownloadUrl = $Manifest.builds.$($LastBuildKey.Name).server.'win-x64'.url ; Invoke-WebRequest -UseBasicParsing -Uri $DownloadUrl -OutFile 'SS14.Server_win-x64.zip' ; Expand-Archive -Path 'SS14.Server_win-x64.zip' -DestinationPath '.' -Force ; Remove-Item 'SS14.Server_win-x64.zip'"

-c 'cd space-station14/server && curl -sLOJ "https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/builds/{{SpecificBuildVersion}}/SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip" && unzip -qo SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip && rm -rf SS14.Server_linux-x64.zip && chmod +x Robust.Server'

-c 'cd space-station14/server && curl -sLOJ "https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/builds/{{SpecificBuildVersion}}/SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip" && unzip -qo SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip && rm -rf SS14.Server_linux-arm64.zip && chmod +x Robust.Server'

/C cd space-station14/server && curl -sLOJ "https://cdn.centcomm.spacestation14.com/builds/wizards/builds/{{SpecificBuildVersion}}/SS14.Server_win-x64.zip" && tar -xf SS14.Server_win-x64.zip && rm SS14.Server_win-x64.zip
